title: Rafflesia Arnoldii

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Summon a guardian plant at a player's house. The plant will appear at the beginning the day.
- Command the plant to release its scent, attacking everyone who visits tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The guardian plant will remain at your targets house until triggered.
- If your target is attacked during the day or the night, the guardian plant will react, attacking the attacker and all other visitors with a Powerful attack.
- When the plant attacks someone for any reason, or if you use your second ability, it will rot that night and you will spend the next night summoning another.
- You may only have one plant summoned at a time.
- The plant is not able to be interacted with, making you immune to effects which cancel or prevent abilities from happening. This is *not* Roleblock Immunity.
